ConfigDescription: TPPT scanner configuration similar to the one appearing in the TPPTsim framework

WorldTree.Name: pcb3
WorldTree.strX: 0.5 * InnerDiam + ScintZ + SiPMBoardThick +  PCB1SizeZ +2 * PCB2SizeZ + 2 * 2.48 + PCB3SizeZ

WorldTree.Name: piece4
WorldTree.strX: 0.5 * (InnerDiam + 2 * Column1RSurf + 2 * Column1SizeZ + 2 * Column2SizeZ + 2 * Column3SizeZ + 2 * Piece1SizeZ + Piece3SizeZ)

WorldTree.Name: outerConnector
WorldTree.strX: 0.5 * (InnerDiam + 2 * Column1RSurf + 2 * Column1SizeZ + 2 * Column2SizeZ + 2 * Column3SizeZ + 2 * Piece1SizeZ + 2 * Piece3SizeZ + ConnectorSizeZ)

WorldTree.Name: column4

WorldTree.Name: holder3
WorldTree.strX: 0.5 * (InnerDiam + 2 * Column1RSurf + 2 * Column1SizeZ + 2 * Column2SizeZ + 2 * Column3SizeZ + 2 * Piece1SizeZ + 2 * Piece3SizeZ + 2 * ConnectorSizeZ + 2 * ExtColumnSizeY + HolderSizeZ)

WorldTree.strX: 0.5 * (InnerDiam + 2 * Column1RSurf + 2 * Column1SizeZ + 2 * Column2SizeZ + 2 * Column3SizeZ + 2 * Piece1SizeZ + 2 * Piece3SizeZ + 2 * ConnectorSizeZ + 2 * ExtColumnSizeY + HolderSizeZ)
